official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of June 22, 1936, to authorize local authorities to maintain and operate automated pumping stations for flood control purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Flood Control Act of 1936 to authorize State and local authorities to maintain and operate automated pumping stations for flood control purposes. Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to prescribe minimum standards for the design of automated systems for such pumping stations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of June 22, 1936, to authorize local authorities to maintain and operate automated pumping stations for flood control purposes.
